index.description:
Personal site of [Muhammad Mustadi](/me).
> ¬∑ 2017/10: `blog` directory is temporarily deactivated while being revamped.

me.title: Muhammad Mustadi
me.markdown:
Hi there, welcome! People call me **Odi**. You may also know me by my screen name, @**mathdroid**. My passion for making stuff is deeply entrenched since I was a kid, and so is my interest in computers. I majored in [Electrical Engineering][1], where I found my true calling, which is [automation][2]. I keep dreaming this version of the world where people no longer have to do dirty jobs anymore, where humanity is [served][3] [by][4] [machines][5], and nobody has to [struggle][6] just to keep themselves alive. I'm working my best to help achieve that cause, but everything must start small, so nowadays I try to make beautiful and performant programs. (Currently in love with [Javascript][7].)

I still [Tweet][8] sometimes üòâ, and if 140 characters aren't enough, I put them into my [Blog](/). Sometimes I do interesting stuff with computers that I put on my [GitHub][10]. My friends and family can find me on [Facebook][11] or [Path][12], and even in [Instagram][13], although I rarely post there. I make chill playlists on [Spotify][14] and track them on [Last.fm][15].

You can reach me via the channels above. If you want to encrypt your messages, my PGP key is hosted on my [Keybase][16]. Cheers! üçª

P.S: for recruiters, here's my [r√©sum√©][17].

[1]: https://itb.ac.id
[2]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automation
[3]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robotics
[4]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Military_robot
[5]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domestic_robot
[6]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_income
[7]: https://babeljs.io/
[8]: https://twitter.com/mathdroid
[9]: https://mustadi.xyz
[10]: https://github.com/mathdroid
[11]: https://www.facebook.com/mathdroid
[12]: https://www.path.com/profile/3GZaRp
[13]: https://instagram.com/idatsum
[14]: https://play.spotify.com/user/12164039257
[15]: http://last.fm/user/mathdroid
[16]: https://keybase.io/mathdroid
[17]: https://standardresume.co/MuhammadMustadi
me.html:
Hi there, welcome! People call me Odi. You may also know me by my screen name, @mathdroid. My passion for making stuff is deeply entrenched since I was a kid, and so is my interest in computers. I majored in Electrical Engineering, where I found my true calling, which is automation. I keep dreaming this version of the world where people no longer have to do dirty jobs anymore, where humanity is served by machines, and nobody has to struggle just to keep themselves alive. I'm working my best to help achieve that cause, but everything must start small, so nowadays I try to make beautiful and performant programs. (Currently in love with Javascript.)

I still Tweet sometimes üòâ, and if 140 characters aren't enough, I put them into my Blog. Sometimes I do interesting stuff with codes that I put on my GitHub. My friends and family can find me on Facebook or Path, and even in Instagram, although I rarely post there. I make chill playlists on Spotify and track them on Last.fm.

You can reach me via the contact form above. If you want to encrypt your messages, my PGP key is hosted on my Keybase. Cheers! üçª

P.S: for recruiters, here's my r√©sum√©.
